attributes.action: Blackmail, Exploitation and harassment by Standard Chartered Bank
attributes.additional_details:
To,

The Hon'ble Prime Minister of United Kingdom,

Sir,

It is  defamatory  on the part of Standard Chartered Bank's India branch, herein after referred to as SCB, to  have reported, unilaterally,  my name to India -CIBIL, for publication in the  public domain, wherein  my name has been defamed and  tarnished.

 Once the issue had been resolved by reversal of the wrogly levied charges after an investigation reflected in the Bill Statement of June 2000  its  blackmail  to  have continued  to build  up  the  paltry sum of Rs 6537.50 of March 2000 to a huge sum of Rs. 5,37,172.86.

 SCB  may please be asked to pay  ( Ten Thousand)  times the amount which  SCB in India have been ill motivatedly and blackmailingly showing me as defaulter.

Yours Sincerely,
Wing Commander Dr Sushil Kumar
chairmanindianhistory @gmail.com

 Reference:,
 Standard Chartered Bank (KMM8788263I15977L0KM)
